title: Extended Slab Serif Decorative Typeface
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725031715im_/http:/typophile.com/files/10476618_778828972157669_4804401909212080041_n_6013.jpg)

Hi everyone, just wondering if anyone knows what typeface this is? I'd really appreciate any help, including suggested alternatives.

Thanks all.
author: The White Lion

comments.content: FontMesa, publisher of the Red Dog Saloon font, also has a spurred version called Go West [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/go-west/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725031715/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/go-west/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/go-west/") If you want more fonts with the style of serif in Red Dog Saloon/57 Rodeo check out the those tagged at Myfonts as "Mansard" or "Detroit Serif."
